meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or frustration.
meanings.sent2: Oh caramba, I forgot my keys again!
meanings.sent3: Caramba, the cat stole my sandwich!
meanings.sent4: The sudden rainstorm caught me off guard, caramba!
meanings.sent5: Caramba! The magician made the rabbit disappear!

meanings.definition: An exclamation of astonishment or annoyance.
meanings.sent2: Caramba, I can't believe I missed the bus!
meanings.sent3: Caramba, the cookie jar is empty again!
meanings.sent4: The fireworks lit up the sky, caramba!
meanings.sent5: Caramba! The roller coaster was thrilling!
